page.shortlink: api a5 get attempted user function
page.description: Return the last user that attempted to log in.
page.discussion: The A5_GetAttemptedUser() function returns the name of the last user to unsuccessfully attempt to log in.
page.example: dim joe as C joe = A5_GetAttemptedUser() ui_msg_box("Failed Attempt at Login", joe + " exceeded the maximum number of logon attempts")
